imdb.plot outline: 21st Century Television with guest host Donald Trump Jr. is an award winning business show that is independently produced by MMP (USA), Inc. The series provides its business viewers an in-depth opportunity to find solutions to the industry problems from some of the top business leaders across the world. Since 1995, MMP has featured over 5,000 companies participating in over 500 shows.
imdb.title: 21st Century Television with Host Donald Trump Jr
akas: 21st Century Television with Host Donald Trump Jr (United States)
